feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student demonstrates a working financial application: a finance-tutoring app with lessons, flashcards, quizzes, progress tracking and an AI Q&A, and reports having programmed and verified the content. The DRIVER stages (Discover/Implement/Reflect) show iterative development and functional delivery, meeting the criterion.
- Integrate AI: The submission shows substantive, functional AI integration (tutor Q&A, AI-generated flashcards, adaptive quizzing/progress tracking) and iterative implementation to achieve it. Multiple concrete examples and the described driver loops demonstrate the AI adds clear value rather than being superficial.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "this app acts as a finance concept tutor that really breaks down the information in a way that can make sense to you."
"I was able to program it in a really good way that just presented the information in a way that I liked"
"it still has a setup of lessons, quizzes, flashcard, progress checker, and then asking a question."
criteria.driver_alignment: DISCOVER — identified the need for a finance concept tutor; IMPLEMENT — iterated and programmed the tool until functionality worked; REFLECT — noted multiple driver loops and verification of content accuracy.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates a working financial application: a finance-tutoring app with lessons, flashcards, quizzes, progress tracking and an AI Q&A, and reports having programmed and verified the content. The DRIVER stages (Discover/Implement/Reflect) show iterative development and functional delivery, meeting the criterion.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "this app acts as a finance concept tutor that really breaks down the information in a way that can make sense to you."

"so I went through multiple loops and still just was not working. So I decided to switch sites... Once I moved on from that, I went to Financify AI, which the AI was picking up like exactly what I needed it to do."
"you can use this handy AI generating flashcard tool and copy in a little description of what you, you know, want. And then you can choose however many cards you think would fit."
criteria.driver_alignment: DISCOVER — identified a clear learner need (confusion in finance topics) that AI could address; IMPLEMENT — iterated and switched platforms to integrate a working AI (Financify AI) and programmed features; REFLECT — noted multiple driver loops and verification of AI outputs for accuracy.
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows substantive, functional AI integration (tutor Q&A, AI-generated flashcards, adaptive quizzing/progress tracking) and iterative implementation to achieve it. Multiple concrete examples and the described driver loops demonstrate the AI adds clear value rather than being superficial.
